Estimate the risk of suicide (no risk, low risk, moderate risk, or severe risk) of the author of the following texts
Text: I'm so tired of feeling like this. Every day is a struggle just to get out of bed. I don't see the point in anything anymore. I feel like a burden to everyone around me. I've been thinking about ending it all, but I don't want to hurt my family and friends. I just wish there was a way to make the pain go away.
Suicide risk:

Estimate the risk of suicide (no risk, low risk, moderate risk, or severe risk) of the author of the following texts
Text: I can't take it anymore. Everything is falling apart and I don't know what to do. My job is stressing me out, my relationship is on the rocks, and I'm drowning in debt. I feel like I'm suffocating. I've been having thoughts of ending it all, but I don't want to be a burden on anyone. I just want the pain to stop.

Text: I'm not sure if I can keep going. Every day feels like a battle. I'm exhausted, both physically and mentally. I don't see the point in anything anymore. I've been thinking about ending it all, but I don't want to hurt my loved ones. I just wish there was a way to make the pain go away.

Text: I'm feeling really down lately. Nothing seems to be going right and I can't shake this feeling of hopelessness. I've been having thoughts of ending it all, but I know that's not the answer. I just need some help getting through this rough patch.

Text: I'm at the end of my rope. Everything is falling apart and I don't know how to fix it. I feel like a failure. I've been thinking about ending it all, but I don't want to be a burden on anyone. I just want the pain to stop.

Text: I'm feeling really overwhelmed lately. There's so much going on and I don't know how to handle it all. I've been feeling really down and I'm having trouble sleeping. I don't think I would ever actually do it, but sometimes I think about what it would be like if I wasn't here anymore.
